width.help: WIDTH of the IFGs to be read in.

file_length.help: FILE_LENGTH of the IFGS to be read in.

wavelength.help: WAVELENGTH of the Stack. If combining sensors,ensure that they are all converted to same units.

heading.help: Heading of the satellite in degrees.

utc.help: Average time of acquisition in seconds of the day

mask.help: Common mask applied to all the images. Useful forfiltering out water bodies.

cthresh.help: Coherence threshold for pixels to be included in analysis.

latfile.help: Latitude file. Same size as IFGs.

lonfile.help: Longitude file. Same size as IFGs.

hgtfile.help: DEM height in radar coordinates. Same size as IFGs.

incidence.help: Incidence angle file. Same size as IFGs. Can be a constant float too.

looks.help: Number of additional looks to be applied for time-series analysis

xmin.help: START of the valid region in X. After taking looks.

xmax.help: END of the valid region in X. After taking looks.

ymin.help: START of the crop region in Y. After taking looks.

ymax.help: END of the crop region in Y. After taking looks.

rxmin.help: Start of reference region in X. After multilooking and cropping.

rxmax.help: End of reference region in X. After multilooking and cropping.

rymin.help: Start of reference region in Y. After multilooking and cropping.

rymax.help: End of reference region in Y. After multilooking and cropping.

latfile.help: Latitude file for the cropped and multilooked image.

lonfile.help: Longitude file for the cropped and multilooked image.

incidence.help: Incidence angle file for the cropped and multilooked image.

hgtfile.help: Height file for the cropped and multilooked image.

h5dir.help: Directory for storing all the HDF5 files.

atmosdir.help: Directory for storing all the weather model data.

figsdir.help: Directory for storing all the PNG previews at intermediate stages.

respdir.help: Directory for storing wavelet impulse responses.

chgendian.help: Convert Endianness when reading in data.

endianlist.help: List for changing endianness. Possible Entries:UNW,COR,HGT,LAT,LON,INC,MASK
